name: Valor
description: You target a creature within a very short (5 unit) distance and grant them a sense of unwavering bravery for 1 minute. If this creature reaches 0 health while this spell is affecting them, they instead drop to 1 health and gain 5 morale, ending the spell.
charge: When the spell is triggered, the creature ignores any mental condition until the end of their next turn.
